properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 1 at 4:14PM AKST until February 3 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as
45 mph. Total snow accumulations of up to 9 inches.

* WHERE...Portage Valley.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to 6 AM AKST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak wind gusts are expected late Sunday
night through early Monday morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SUNDAY TO 6 AM AKST MONDAY FOR THE PORTAGE VALLEY
